subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: When Ryan McDonagh and Dan Girardi targeted the Capitals’ Alex Ovechkin, their strategy paid off in two victories at the Garden. The Rangers plan to limit Ovechkin’s shot attempts in Game 5.
snippet: When Ryan McDonagh and Dan Girardi targeted the Capitals’ Alex Ovechkin, their strategy paid off in two victories at the Garden. The Rangers plan to limit Ovechkin’s shot attempts in Game 5.
